channel.title: CVE Feed for forgerock -- access management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for forgerock -- access management

item.title: CVE-2023-0582|2024-08-01T17:56:59.766Z -- forgerock -- access%20management
item.description:
Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in ForgeRock Access Management allows Authorization Bypass.
This issue affects access management: before 7.3.0, before 7.2.1, before 7.1.4, through 7.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-0582|2024-03-27T17:09:43.769Z -- forgerock -- access%20management

Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in ForgeRock Access Management allows Authorization Bypass.
